Trade/Device Name(s): Cepheid Xpert CT/NG Vaginal/Endocervical Specimen Collection Kit
Cepheid Xpert CT/NG Urine Specimen Collection Kit
Regulation Name(s): Neisseria spp. direct serological test reagents
Specimen Container(s): Xpert CT/NG Swab Transport Reagent tube
Xpert CT/NG Urine Transport Reagent tube
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Cepheid Xpert CT/NG Assay, an automated multiplex real-time PCR test for detection and differentiation of Chlamydia trachomatis and Neisseria gonorrhoeae DNA using GeneXpert Instrument Systems
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative real-time PCR test for automated detection and differentiation of Chlamydia trachomatis and/or Neisseria gonorrhoeae DNA in female/male urine, endocervical swab, and patient-collected vaginal swab from asymptomatic and symptomatic individuals to aid in diagnosis of chlamydial and gonorrheal urogenital disease
